title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Drain the pasta and mix with bacon and egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
In a pan, heat tomato puree and add cream.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy bread topped with smashed avocado, a pinch of salt, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until crispy.
Mash the avocado with a fork and season with salt.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toasted bread.
Top with fresh herbs if desired and serve immediately.
